related_questions.question:
Rio Hello, Dhika. What time do you usually go to school?    Dhika :I go to school at six o'clock
Rio : Six o'clock? How do you go to school?
Dhika : I go to school by school bus
Rio Now. What kinds of things do you take to school?
Dhika : I usually take my backpack and books
Rio : okay. What is the first thing you do when you arrive at school?
Dhika we always greet our teachers and start our class with prayer
Rio : why do you usually study at school on Monday?
Dhika : we study English, civics, art and math
Rio : okay, where do you usually eat for lunch? Do you have lunchroom, canteen or cafeteria?
Dhika yes, there is canteen in my school
Rio now, what time do you usually go home?
Dhika : we sometimes go home at 3 o'clock
1. What time does Dhika go to school?
A. At six o'clock
B. At seven o'clock
C. At eight o'clock
D. At a half six o'clock
​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

A. at six a clock

Penjelasan:

semangat belajar nya !

related_questions.question: Lirik lagu que sera sera menjelaskan tentang ap??​

answers.answer:

Saat aku masih kecil

When I was just a little girl

Saya bertanya kepada ibu saya, saya akan menjadi apa?

I asked my mother, what will I be

Apakah saya akan cantik?

Will I be pretty

Apakah saya akan kaya?

Will I be rich

Inilah yang dia katakan padaku

Here's what she said to me

Que sera, sera

Que sera, sera

Apa yang terjadi terjadilah

Whatever will be, will be

Masa depan bukan milik kita untuk dilihat

The future's not ours to see

Que sera, sera

Que sera, sera

Apa yang akan terjadi terjadilah

What will be, will be

Aku bertanya pada kekasihku, apa yang ada di depan

I asked my sweetheart, what lies ahead

Akankah kita memiliki pelangi?

Will we have rainbows

Hari demi hari

Day after day

Inilah yang dikatakan kekasihku

Here's what my sweetheart said

Que sera, sera

Que sera, sera

Apa yang terjadi terjadilah

Whatever will be, will be

Masa depan bukan milik kita untuk dilihat

The future's not ours to see

Que sera, sera

Que sera, sera

Apa yang akan terjadi terjadilah

What will be, will be

Now I have children of my own

Mereka bertanya pada ibu mereka, aku akan jadi apa?

They ask their mother, what will I be

Apakah saya akan tampan?

Will I be handsome

Apakah saya akan kaya?

Will I be rich

Saya memberi tahu mereka dengan lembut

I tell them tenderly

Que sera, sera

Que sera, sera

Apa yang terjadi terjadilah

Whatever will be, will be

Masa depan bukan milik kita untuk dilihat

The future's not ours to see

Que sera, sera

Que sera, sera

Apa yang akan terjadi terjadilah

What will be, will be

Que sera, sera

Que sera, sera

ke kahawatiran se orang anak akn masa depan nya

related_questions.question:
2. Menulis minimal 5 kalimat possitive degree ttg benda2 di rumahmu.    3. Menulis minimal 5 kalimat comparative degree ttg benda2 di rumahmu
 4. Pilih 5 pertanyaan d bawah ini, jawablah dengam kalimat superlative degree.
 Questions
 1. Which flower has the most /the worst fragrance?
 2. What is the longest/shortest river in the world?
 3. Who is the heaviest/lightest man in the world?
 4. Which is the smallest/biggest animal in the world?
 5. Which animal does have the slowest/fastest movement?
 6. What is the cheapest/the most expensive thing in the world?
 7. What is the most popular activity during pandemic?
 8. Who is the oldest man in the world?

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

2. Menulis minimal 5 kalimat positive degree ttg benda2 di rumahmu.

a. My smartphone is as sophisticated as my laptop.

b. My car is as expensive as my uncle's car.

c. My bicycle is as new as my neighbor's bicycle.

d. My room is as clean as a hotel's room.

e. My books are as important as my professor's books.

3. Menulis minimal 5 kalimat comparative degree ttg benda2 di rumahmu

a. My laptop is more expensive than my smart phone.

b. My car is more expensive than my motorcycle.

c. My neighbor's bicycle is cheaper than my bicycle.

d. My room is more comfortable than a hotel's room.

e. My books are more important than my toys.

4. Pilih 5 pertanyaan d bawah ini, jawablah dengam kalimat superlative degree.

Questions

1. Which flower has the most /the worst fragrance?

I think Jasmine flowers have the most fragrance.

I think Rafflesia Arnoldii has the worst fragrance.

2. What is the longest/shortest river in the world?

The Nile River is the longest river in the world.

The Roe River is the shortest river in the world.

3. Who is the heaviest/lightest man in the world?

Franco is the heaviest man in the world.

Junrey Balawing is the lightest man in the world.

4. Which is the smallest/biggest animal in the world?

The biggest animal in the world is Antarctic Blue Whale.

The smallest animal in the world is Etruscan shrew.

5. Which animal does have the slowest/fastest movement?

Cheetahs have the fastest movement of all animals.

Snails have the slowest movement of all animals.

6. What is the cheapest/the most expensive thing in the world?

A Lamborghini is the most expensive thing in the world.

Wheat is the cheapest thing in the world.

7. What is the most popular activity during pandemic?

The most popular activity during pandemic is making contents on social media.

8. Who is the oldest man in the world?

Kane Tanaka from Japan is the oldest man in the world. He was born in 1903.

Penjelasan:

Rumus Degrees of Comparison:

Terdapat tiga tingkat perbandingan untuk kata sifat dan kata keterangan dalam bahasa Inggris, yaitu:

Positive degree

Comparative degree

Superlative degree

Positive degree digunakan untuk menyatakan sesuatu dalam keadaan selevel:

Contoh : I am as happy as my parents. (Aku sebahagia kedua orang tuaku)

Comparative degree dibentuk dengan menambahkan akhiran "-er"

Contoh : Tony is younger than i am. (Tony lebih muda dariku)

Superlative degree dengan menambahkan akhiran "-est" dan memiliki arti sebagai yang paling sehingga tidak bisa dibandingkan lagi.

Contoh : I am the youngest person in my family. (Aku adalah orang termuda / yang paling muda di dalam keluargaku)

Semoga membantu ya.

 6.Farida-girl-slim

related_questions.question:
⬇QUIZ⬇

Sebutkan rumus simple last tense ! 

No ngasal​

answers.answer:
Verbal

  • (+) S + Verb₂ + o/c
  • (-) S + did not/didn’t + +Verb₁ + o/c
  • (?) Did + S + Verb₁ + o/c ?

Nominal

  • (+) S + to be (was/were) + Adj/Adv/Noun
  • (-) S + to be (was/were) + not + Adj/Adv/Noun
  • (?) To be (was/were) + S + Adj/Adv/Noun

Pembahasan

Simple past tense adalah sebuah kata kerja yang digunakan untuk berbicara tentang aktivitas masa lalu. Simple Past sendiri biasanya menggunakan past verb/verb 2. Keterangan waktu yang biasa digunakan yaitu last week, last night, last month, last year, yesterday dsb.

Contoh kalimat

Verbal

  • (+) She went to Jakarta yesterday
  • (-) She didn't go to Jakarta yesterday
  • (?) Did she go to Jakarta yesterday?

Nominal

  • (+) You were a student last year
  • (-) You were not a student last year
  • (?) Were you a student last year?

Pelajari lebih lanjut

  • 1.rumus simpel past tense dan berikan 3 contoh kalitugas: brainly.co.id/tugas/29713480
  • berikan 15 contoh simple past tense beserta positif, negatif dan interogatif ?? : brainly.co.id/tugas/14440709
  • buatlah 5 kalimat past tense (+) (-) (?) : brainly.co.id/tugas/24486587

Detail jawaban

Kelas : 8

Mapel : Bahasa Inggris

Materi : Chapter 9 — Past tense

Kode Mapel : 5

Kode Kategorisasi : 8.5.9
